tr.td: WITF wins toss, defers; OWU will receive, defend South endzone.
W. Gingery kickoff 57 yards to the OWU08, Tim Shadoan return 27 yards to the OWU35, out-of-bounds (R. Myers).
Dominick Orsini pass complete to C. Lacanaria for 9 yards to the OWU44 (J. Mastin; J. Kolinac).
Dominick Orsini pass complete to C. Lacanaria for 11 yards to the WITF45 (W. Thomas).
Dominick Orsini sacked for loss of 7 yards to the OWU48 (B. Saul; J. Bannick).
TraVon Wilkes rush for 6 yards to the WITF46, out-of-bounds (D. Holmes).
Dominick Orsini pass incomplete to Eugene Coleman (R. Myers).
Rich Poutier punt 33 yards to the WITF13, downed.
J. Dehnke rush for 3 yards to the WITF16 (Dominic Wilson; W. Cherrelus).
Z. Jenkins pass complete to C. Stump for 84 yards to the OWU00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 12:40.
W. Gingery kickoff 60 yards to the OWU05, Tim Shadoan return 16 yards to the OWU21 (J. Kolinac; J. Waire).
TraVon Wilkes rush for loss of 1 yard to the OWU20 (J. Bannick).
TraVon Wilkes rush for no gain to the OWU20 (J. Bannick; A. Towsey).
Dominick Orsini pass intercepted by J. Kolinac at the OWU25, J. Kolinac return 10 yards to the OWU15 (TraVon Wilkes).
Z. Jenkins pass incomplete to T. Everidge.
Z. Jenkins pass complete to Z. Culvahouse for 6 yards to the OWU09 (Ethan Clift).
PENALTY WITF false start (T. Everidge) 5 yards to the OWU14.
PENALTY WITF false start (J. Siler) 5 yards to the OWU19.
Z. Jenkins pass complete to C. Stump for 19 yards to the OWU00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 10:04.
W. Gingery kickoff 64 yards to the OWU01, Jerry Harper return 28 yards to the OWU29 (J. Mastin).
TraVon Wilkes rush for 5 yards to the OWU34 (R. Myers).
Dominick Orsini rush for 8 yards to the OWU42 (W. Thomas), PENALTY WITF personal foul (A. Murray) 15 yards to the WITF43.
Dominick Orsini pass complete to Tim Shadoan for 3 yards to the WITF40 (A. Murray; J. Kolinac).
TraVon Wilkes rush for 1 yard to the WITF39 (J. Kolinac; W. Norelia).
PENALTY OWU false start (Adrian Bishop) 5 yards to the WITF44.
Dominick Orsini pass complete to Adrian Bishop for 26 yards to the WITF18 (K. Wilson; R. Myers).

Dominick Orsini pass complete to Tim Shadoan for 3 yards to the WITF18 (J. Kolinac).
Dominick Orsini pass incomplete to Adrian Bishop (J. Mastin), PENALTY WITF pass interference (J. Mastin) 12 yards to the WITF06, NO PLAY.
Dominick Orsini rush for 6 yards to the WITF00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 06:01.

Nolan Kovach kickoff 59 yards to the WITF06, A. Murray return 31 yards to the WITF37, out-of-bounds (Nolan Kovach), PENALTY WITF holding (L. Bowling) 14 yards to the WITF23, 1st and 10, WITF ball on WITF23.
J. Dehnke rush for 5 yards to the WITF28 (Gary Brodek).
